title.narrative: Ho Chi Minh City Investment Fund for Urban Development Project

description.narrative: To develop HIFU as a model LDIF (in terms of internal policy and procedures for financial policy, sub-project appraisal, social and environmental safeguards, and partnership with the private sector) and increase private sector participation in financing municipal infrastructure in HCMC

condition.narrative: GOV shall cause the HCMC to take all actions to enable HIFU to perform its obligations under the PA
HIFU shall ensure that the value of all equity investments do not exceed 50% of its paid-incapital
HIFU shall maintain a Project working team thorughout project implementation period
HIFU shall provide Project Reports on the basis of indicators agreed
HIFU should adopt the PPA Manual and PSP Manual, and implement the provisions in financing sub-projects under the project
HIFU's ratio of debt to equity does not exceed 3:1
